‘wasana’, ‘ෙmanara thanna’ eeta udaharana.rambaukkana sarath wijayanandaprashnaya - parani chithrapata nili sunila jayanthi dan ko?pilithura - 57 ee, parana para, nawala, rajagiriya lipinayen wimasa balanna.kadawatha sujatha gunawardhanaprashnaya - ‘sikuru tharuwa’ chithrapataye punyage pemwatha lesa rangapa naluwa kawuda?pilithura - sheltan silwarathnapure lakshman kumarasiriprashnaya - nalu lakshman mendisge lipinaya kumak da?pilithura - 63, kumara widiya, kolambaa 11.kaluthara dakuna dodangoda en.di. ised siriwardhanaprashnaya - sirisena wimalawirage ‘amma’ chithrapataya thiragatha wu wasara kumak da?pilithura - 1949beruwala sarath nanayakkaraprashnaya - hindi chithrapata nili nutan rangapa chithrapata monawada?pilithura - sujatha, bandani, anari, there garke samane, chaliya, hamlog, milan, basanth.moratuwa katubadde dadli gomasprashnaya - daya da alwis namin kalakaruwan dedenek ma ape rate sitinawa neda?pilithura - ekkenek daya alwis.
ee anuwa widya pitaye gewidu kumarathungage nayakathwayen podu sisun swadhina shishya sangamayata erehiwa eka kandawurakata paminiyeya.
*/ andenawa ne?...
